thread.section_title: Comfort Hotel Bolivar - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location, friendly staff
thread.title_full: Great location, friendly staff - Review of Comfort Hotel Bolivar, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: shy67
title: Great location, friendly staff
text:
Got a room for an early arrival without any extra charge, the room was a bit small but clean and tidy and the air conditioning was great (I was there in mid summer ...)
all and all it was a very good stay and I would return to this hotel with friendly staff again.
The location is very good
